ira.title: Irish Republican Army (IRA)
ira.description: A republican paramilitary group seeking to end British rule in Northern Ireland.

uda.title: Ulster Defence Association (UDA)
uda.description: A loyalist paramilitary organization defending unionist interests.

bloody_sunday.title: Bloody Sunday (1972)
bloody_sunday.description: British soldiers shot unarmed civil rights protesters in Derry, escalating tensions across Northern Ireland.
